title: Start in full screen?
desc: Should the app window be maximized upon start?

title: Standard loading folder
desc: Defines the standard folder opened when NucDetect tries to load images

title: Standard saving folder
desc: The folder used to save result csv files.

title: Standard result image folder
desc: The folder were result images will be saved

title: Standard name of result csv files
desc: The name used when saving csv files.

title: Standard name of result image files
desc: The name used when saving result images.

title: Append original file name
desc: Should the file name of the original file be appended to the file name of the result image?

title: Standard file format of result images
